column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As a vegetarian
column2: I was happy to see more than one vegetarian ramen option on the menu. I ordered the vegetarian soup ramen which tasted exactly how it sounds. The overall flavor was very mild and salty. I appreciated the fact that you can ask for mild
column4: or spicy levels. There is also chili sauce on the tables to flavor the ramen if you do not enjoy yours. Although I did not enjoy the ramen I chose
column5: the vibe of JINYA was enjoyable. The lights were dim and the decoration was nice. I would advise
column6: if going to this JINYA location
column7: arrive very early especially at dinner time as there will be a wait and they do not do reservations.
